duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct manual, semi-automated, and automated experiments under GLP conditions in BSL-2 and BSL-3 laboratories.
Perform RNA/DNA extraction and purification, and execute other molecular techniques including PCR, RT-PCR, immunoassays, and sample preparation in support of various projects.
Generate, collect, and analyze data, and maintain laboratory facility and perform equipment maintenance.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor of Science in Biology, Biochemistry, Chemistry, or related field
